body:
Follow these steps before you continue.

1. Read the [child arrangements guide]({app:urls:url:cait}) to see if you need to go to court - there may be a more suitable way to reach an agreement.
2. If you do need to go you must attend a Mediation Information and Assessment Meeting (MIAM) or [check if you're exempt]({app:urls:url:miams-exemptions}).
3. Check if you can [get help paying the court fee]({app:urls:url:help-with-fees}).
heading: Before you start you application
